inclusion.criterion: active, moderate-to-severe Graves' orbitopathy or dysthyroid orbit neuropathy
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: alanine aminotransferase and/or aspartate aminotransferase >2x upper limit of normal
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: present or past medical history of autoimmune hepatitis
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: There is a documented positive serum MPO-ANCA in his medical record.

exclusion.criterion: previous glucocorticoids therapy within the last 6 months
exclusion.label: unknown
met
exclusion.evidence: His Birmingham Vasculitis Activity Score (BVAS) is above 4 since the beginning of his disease.

notes: Patient has active vasculitis and is being treated with corticosteroid and cyclophosphamides.
